qa.question: First five books: PEANUT TECH
He prophesised the destruction of Nineveh: HUMAN
Long live! : HEALTH MUSE
This is set on fire by hell: GO TUNE
Bring out the meaning: SIX GEESE
David and the whole house of Israel were singing songs and playing many musical instruments while transporting this.
qa.answer: The ark of the covenent (II Samuel 6:5)

qa.question: In the time of Daniel, people of Babylon had to do this when they heard the sound of many musical instruments.
qa.answer: bow down and worship the golden image (Daniel 3:5)

qa.question: After David had killed the Philistine, the women danced and sang with these instruments
David's harp had ten strings as shown here. It is commonly known as this
This instrument, made of ram's horn was blown during important events,
"But even if He does not, we want you to know, O king, that we will not serve your gods or worship the image of gold you have set up."
"You brood of vipers! Who warned you to flee from the coming wrath?"
"your sister-in-law is going back to her people and her gods. Go back with her."
"There is a lion outside!", "I will be murdered in the streets!"
"Leave these men alone! Let them go! For if their purpose or activity is of human origin, it will fail. But if it is from God, you will not be able to stop these men;"
This place is called such because its water was bitter
After this man drank from a God given spring called "En Hakkore", his strength returned.
The Psalmist writes "I tested you at the waters of ___"
These men broke through the Philistine lines to get water for David who was very thirsty
qa.answer: three mighty men (Abishai, Benaiah and unnamed) II Samuel 23:16

qa.question: Peter compares false prophets to these. Blackest darkness is reserved for them
During this 40 year period the Israelites drank no wine
This happens to new wine when put in old wineskins
Lemuel is told in Proverbs that it is not good for people with this occupation to drink wine
The king of Susa had been drinking wine when he commanded this woman be brought out
According to Hosea, this Middle East country is famed for its wine.
The dove returned to Noah's ark with this in its mouth.
This man climbed a tree in order to see Jesus.
Aaron's rod that budded brought forth this type of fruit
Absalom was fleeing battle when he got his head caught in this type of tree
The men who went to spy on Cannon brought grapes, figs and these
The kingdom of heaven is like this seed
The man who built his house upon the sand is compared to this
qa.answer: he who hears God's words and does not put them into practice

qa.question: The kingdom of heaven is like leaven, which a woman took and did this.
qa.answer: hid in three measures of meal till it was all leavened (Mat 13:33)

qa.question: The merchant sold all that he had to acquire this.
Jesus told the parable of the unforgiving servant when Peter asked him about this.
qa.answer: how many times should I forgive my brother? (Matt 18:21)

qa.question: Come, let us bow down in worship, let us kneel before the LORD our Maker;
qa.answer: for he is our God and we are the people of his pasture, the flock under his care... (Ps 95:7)

qa.question: Blessed are the meek, for they will inherit the earth.
qa.answer: Blessed are those who hunger and thirst for righteousness, for they will be filled. (Matt 5:6)

qa.question: Though the fig tree does not bud and there are no grapes on the vines,...and no cattle in the stalls,
qa.answer: yet I will rejoice in the LORD, I will be joyful in God my Savior. (Habakkuk 3:18)

qa.question: The thief comes only to steal and kill and destroy; I have come that they may have life, and have it to the full.
qa.answer: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep (John 10:11)

qa.question: No, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him who loved us.
qa.answer: For I am convinced that neither death nor life, neither angels nor demons, neither the present nor the future, nor any powers, neither height nor depth, nor anything else in all creation, will be able to separate us from the love of God that is in Christ Jesus our Lord.(Rom 8:38-39)
